feed.title: noises
feed.subtitle: I wouldn't want to drink with anyone who only likes one kind of music... John Wheeler (Hayseed Dixie)

entry.title: Other Noises #43
entry.content:
Tracklist:

  • Moondog - Remember

  • Eddie Cochran - I Remember

  • Elvis Presley - I Forgot to Remember to Forget

  • Hank Williams - Jesus Remembered Me

  • Leonard Cohen - I Can’t Forget

  • Pink Floyd - Remember A Day

  • Faust - Flashback Caruso (Sosna)

  • Synthikat - Forgotten Worlds

  • The Kinks - Do You Remember Walter?
